about_the_game:
Story

Based in New York, in 1949, the main character is Arthur Drake a detective who is a loner in his police force. One night Arthur discovers that his partner and sole friend is killed. By exploring the deeper details of this death, Arthur starts to come across cases that expand into an interconnected network of crimes. As Arthur, your job is to uncover the true reason for these deaths and get justice for the friend you lost. However, there is more than meets the eye to these crimes because the Greek Gods are at play. Throughout the game, the story takes a noir detective theme as well as incorporating Greek mythology. As Arthur discovers what the Gods have to do with these deaths he must face hard truths about his part to play in all of this.

Gameplay Features

  • A cast of four playable characters!

  • Challenging turn-based combat!

  • 5 Chapter campaign that will update and release over time.
  • A bond system that allows you to learn more details of NPCs the more you speak to them.
  • An open world with different regions of New York as well the Underworld.

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of vulgar and crude Language, drug and alcohol abuse, and acts of murder and torture.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, SteamOS, Linux
  • Processor: Dual Core with Hyper-Threading
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX 480
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Twilight's Final Judgement is a noir turn-based RPG. Players will explore a 1940s New York where the secret elites of the world are the Greek Gods. You will level up and build upon 4 playable characters. Players will also talk with NPCs learn secret lore and form bonds.
